body.p: Booneville, Kentucky, farmer, captain (U.S.A.). Owsley COunty, Kentucky native. Son of Elijah Isaacs and Sarah Bowman. Married to Martha Brewer Isaacs in Owsley County, Kentucky on June 2, 1853. Father of Sarah Isaacs Hall, James B. Isaacs, Mary Isaacs Mainous, Preston Isaacs, Orvil Isaacs. Farm laborer in Owsley County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Owsley County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry as first lieutenant in August 4, 1862 and captain on April 21, 1863.
